creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark and gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture, by exchange
description:
THIS PIECE HAS NOT BEEN FULLY ACCESSIONED INTO THE PERMANENT COLLECTION AS OF 12/10/15.  72.5% INTEREST IN THE PIECE IS STILL THE PROPERTY OF LIBBY CLARK AND THE ESTATE OF WILLARD CLARK PENDING COMPLETION OF THE GIFT CONTRACT.  (See Notes.)

tall, wavy wall; dark on one side, reddish-brown wood-grain pattern on other side
title: Innerside--Outerside
